value.stringValue: Load the column configuration from a custom Configuration record
Pick your table columns from a list

Flow.description: Flow designed to run inside of the datatable CPE to select and set component attributes by interacting with a sample datatable.
Flow.label: Datatable Configuration Wizard

value.stringValue: How do you want to select your columns?
